document_data.mainbody:
he Great Trade Road was a trail in Anauroch.
The road headed westThe road turns north, and thus it cant be a path straight south or straight north. Some continued west from the point where it turned north, and thus the road couldnt come from the west thus, it is assumed to head west. A closer reading may contradict this conclusion. from Bitter Well Oasis, and continued for roughly five days, maybe a little less, until it reached a pillar at which the trail turned north, towards the Well of the Chasm.
At some point around ,The default 2-edition date of 1368 DR is assumed. a number of caravans went missing trying to find another way across the mountains. Those turned west instead of north at the pillar.
